languages.text: {n}Арджента кажется спокойной. Пугающе спокойной. Молодую Сестру битвы окружает аура непоколебимой решимости, презирающей даже намек на сопротивление или препятствия. Вторя темному огню в глазах Ардженты, пламя пылает и в декоре величественной силовой брони, в которую облачена сестра.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента кажется спокойной. Пугающе спокойной. Молодую сестру битвы окружает аура непоколебимой решимости, презирающей даже намек на сопротивление или препятствия. Вторя темному огню в глазах Ардженты, пламя пылает и в декоре величественной силовой брони, в которую облачена сестра.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta's appearance is calm to the point of being frightening. She is surrounded by an aura of unwavering resolve that scorns the very idea of faltering in the face of opposition or obstacles. The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента кажется спокойной. Пугающе спокойной. Молодую Сестру битвы окружает аура непоколебимой решимости, презирающей даже намек на сопротивление или препятствия. Вторя темному огню в глазах Ардженты, пламя пылает и в декоре величественной силовой брони, в которую облачена сестра.{/n}

The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの様子は恐ろしいほど穏やかだ。彼女は確固たる決心のオーラを身に纏っており、敵対者や障害物に直面した際にたじろいでしまうことを激しく軽蔑している。アルジェンタの瞳の暗い炎は、彼女が身につけている壮大なパワーアーマーの輝きと調和していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's appearance is calm to the point of being frightening. She is surrounded by an aura of unwavering resolve that scorns the very idea of faltering in the face of opposition or obstacles. The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの様子は恐ろしいほど穏やかだ。彼女は確固たる決心のオーラを身に纏っており、敵対者や障害物に直面した際にたじろいでしまうことを激しく軽蔑している。アルジェンタの瞳の暗い炎は、彼女が身につけている壮大なパワーアーマーの輝きと調和していた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的外表平静得令人恐惧，整个人都包裹在坚定不移的决心之中，仿佛仅仅是想要退缩的念头就会激起她的蔑视。阿洁塔眼中黑暗的火焰，与她身上威严的动力装甲相应相称。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's appearance is calm to the point of being frightening. She is surrounded by an aura of unwavering resolve that scorns the very idea of faltering in the face of opposition or obstacles. The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的外表平静得令人恐惧，整个人都包裹在坚定不移的决心之中，仿佛仅仅是想要退缩的念头就会激起她的蔑视。阿洁塔眼中黑暗的火焰，与她身上威严的动力装甲相应相称。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La froideur d'Argenta trahit un détachement inquiétant. Elle dégage une aura de détermination inébranlable propre à rejeter en bloc la seule idée de flancher devant les obstacles quels qu'ils soient. Au feu sombre de son regard fait écho la radiance de l'armure de pouvoir majestueuse dont elle est revêtue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's appearance is calm to the point of being frightening. She is surrounded by an aura of unwavering resolve that scorns the very idea of faltering in the face of opposition or obstacles. The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La froideur d'Argenta trahit un détachement inquiétant. Elle dégage une aura de détermination inébranlable propre à rejeter en bloc la seule idée de flancher devant les obstacles quels qu'ils soient. Au feu sombre de son regard fait écho la radiance de l'armure de pouvoir majestueuse dont elle est revêtue.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}El aspecto de Argenta es tan tranquilo que casi da miedo. Le rodea un aura de determinación que se burla de la mera idea de flaquear ante los enemigos o los obstáculos. El fuego oscuro que arde en los ojos de Argenta solo lo igual el resplandor de su majestuosa servoarmadura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's appearance is calm to the point of being frightening. She is surrounded by an aura of unwavering resolve that scorns the very idea of faltering in the face of opposition or obstacles. The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El aspecto de Argenta es tan tranquilo que casi da miedo. Le rodea un aura de determinación que se burla de la mera idea de flaquear ante los enemigos o los obstáculos. El fuego oscuro que arde en los ojos de Argenta solo lo igual el resplandor de su majestuosa servoarmadura.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Auftreten ist so ruhig, dass man fast Angst bekommen könnte. Sie ist von einer Aura unerschütterlicher Entschlossenheit umgeben, die schon die Idee unmöglich macht, angesichts von Widerstand und Hindernissen klein beizugeben. Das dunkle Feuer in Argentas Augen passt zu der Strahlkraft der majestätischen Servorüstung, die sie trägt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's appearance is calm to the point of being frightening. She is surrounded by an aura of unwavering resolve that scorns the very idea of faltering in the face of opposition or obstacles. The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Auftreten ist so ruhig, dass man fast Angst bekommen könnte. Sie ist von einer Aura unerschütterlicher Entschlossenheit umgeben, die schon die Idee unmöglich macht, angesichts von Widerstand und Hindernissen klein beizugeben. Das dunkle Feuer in Argentas Augen passt zu der Strahlkraft der majestätischen Energierüstung, die sie trägt.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, insanın gözünü korkutacak derece sakin görünüyor. Etrafını ise engeller ve muhalefet karşısında sendeleme fikrini hor gören, yılmak bilmez bir kararlılık havası çevreliyor. Argenta'nın gözlerinde, giydiği görkemli güç zırhı setinin aydınlığına yaraşır karanlıkta alevler dans ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's appearance is calm to the point of being frightening. She is surrounded by an aura of unwavering resolve that scorns the very idea of faltering in the face of opposition or obstacles. The dark fire in Argenta's eyes is matched by the radiance of the majestic set of power armour she is wearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, insanın gözünü korkutacak derece sakin görünüyor. Etrafını ise engeller ve muhalefet karşısında sendeleme fikrini hor gören, yılmak bilmez bir kararlılık havası çevreliyor. Argenta'nın gözlerinde giydiği görkemli güç zırhı setinin aydınlığına yaraşan kara alevler dans ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
